author: ghugo83
body:
This allows to fix the handling of all XMLs (SpecPar) by DD4hep FilteredView.

This comes in addition to PRs by @ianna to DD4hep FilteredView.

Thanks to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31573, there was already no diff between old DD and DD4hep, for ALL data members except RL and Xi.
This now allows to have RL and Xi properly computed: 0 diff in old DD versus DD4hep for RL and Xi values.

As mentioned in the TO-DO list in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31573 , there were **fixes to do in the CMS DD4hep FilteredView interface, to be able to properly process the paths defined in the XMLs.**
With COCOA, PPS, and Tracker migrations, I had always observed issues in the handling of paths from SpecPars in XMLs, with DD4hep.

This was fixed by addressing 2 issues in the DD4hep FilteredView:
- in the case when copy number was looked at, the comparison was switching to next volume in path (without comparing volumes names).
- the copy numbers of all nodes in hierarchy should be used, not only present node copy number.
title: Fix handling of XML paths (SpecPar) by DD4hep FilteredView
